      • withPersister

        public BasicStateMachine.StateMachineBuilder<S,​E,​P> withPersister​(StateMachinePersister<S,​E,​P> persister)
        StateMachinePersister.getCurrentState(Object) will be called on build(Object). StateMachinePersister.persist(Object, StateMachineTransition) will be called on success state transition.
